name: New EV Instant Rebate
description: $4,000 instant rebate on new battery electric vehicle (max vehicle price $60,000); must be within 100% Area Median Income or enrolled in CARE/FERA
fullDescription: San Jose Clean Energy offers substantial instant rebates on new electric vehicles for income-qualified residents, making EV ownership more accessible for lower-income households.
whatTheyOffer:
- $4,000 instant rebate on new EV
- Applied at point of sale
- Maximum vehicle price $60,000
- For battery electric vehicles only
- Available at participating dealerships
- Immediate savings, no waiting for rebate
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a San Jose Clean Energy customer
2. Must be within 100% Area Median Income
3. Or be enrolled in CARE or FERA program
4. Apply online for income verification
5. Or present CARE/FERA documentation at dealership
6. Purchase new EV at participating dealership
keywords: SJCE, San Jose Clean Energy, new EV, $4000, instant rebate, electric vehicle, CARE, FERA, low-income, dealer
